thread.title: India’s Sun TV Could Rise Again
thread.title_full: India’s Sun TV Could Rise Again - WSJ

author: Abheek Bhattacharya
title: India’s Sun TV Could Rise Again
text:
Emerging-market investors are used to discounting for political risk. In the case of India’s Sun TV Network, though, they’re discounting too much.
Sun TV, with a market capitalization of $2.1 billion, is one of India’s largest TV networks. Its everyday business got complicated earlier this year, when regulators denied its radio channels a key security clearance and forbade them from participating in radio-wave auctions.
